select t.id,u.name as owner,t.money,t.name,t.expectedDate,c.name as customerId,t.stage,t.type,t.source,t.activityId,cs.fullname as contactsId,t.createBy,t.createTime,t.editBy,t.editTime,t.description,t.contactSummary,t.nextContactTime from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId=c.id join tbl_contacts cs on t.contactsId=cs.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and c.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and cs.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'
order by t.createTime desc

select t.id,u.name as owner,t.money,t.name,t.expectedDate,c.name as customerId,t.stage,t.type,t.source,a.name as activityId,cs.fullname as contactsId,t.createBy,t.createTime,t.editBy,t.editTime,t.description,t.contactSummary,t.nextContactTime from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId=c.id left join tbl_contacts cs on t.contactsId=cs.id left join tbl_activity a on t.activityId=a.id where t.id=#{id}
